title: HOUR 1- Louis Riddick Sep 29, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 1- Louis Riddick Sep 29, 2020
description:
Louis Riddick tells Dan that he got the message from the mother of Patrick Mahomes that his name is not Pat but Patrick Mahomes. Louis says that now Mahomes is so comfortable that its like he has the answers to the test before the play even starts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Louis Riddick tells Dan that he got the message from the mother of Patrick Mahomes that his name is not Pat but Patrick Mahomes. Louis says that now Mahomes is so comfortable that its like he has the answers to the test before the play even starts.
